From: Pearl Ellis, To: Ruby Chandler Mailed From: Manchester, Illinois on November 21, 1910 Postcard Info: "Thanksgiving" Series Number 926 Copyright 1910 A.S Meeker, NY

Miss Ruby Chandler Pearl, Illinois

Nov. 21-10 Dear Ruby, I am sick in bed with grippe and will be out of school all week. I hair it like everything. I hope to hear from you soon. Lovingly, Pearl E.
